programming.name: Khánh Anh
programming.quote: Code is poetry written in logic

programming.quote: Teaching machines to think, one algorithm at a time

programming.name: Minh Quang
programming.quote: AI is not about replacing humans, it's about augmenting them

programming.name: Đăng Minh

programming.name: Minh Dũng
programming.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code

mechanical.name: Thế Khải
mechanical.quote: Engineering is the art of making the impossible possible

mechanical.quote: Precision in design, excellence in execution

mechanical.name: Minh Khang
mechanical.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower

mechanical.quote: Building the future, one component at a time

mechanical.name: Trần Khoa
mechanical.quote: Design is not just what it looks like, it's how it works

business.name: Dương Lâm
business.quote: Strategy without execution is just a dream

business.name: Phương Thảo
business.quote: Success is where preparation meets opportunity

business.name: Quang Huy
business.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it

business.name: Đức Hùng
business.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person
